author: crossley
msg: Add a project-specific cli.xconf for the Forrest documentation.
Needed primarily to enable processing of the extra file mirrors.html
Apart from that, this is a copy of default src/core/context/WEB-INF/cli.xconf

author: crossley
msg: Lots of explanations and updated comments.
New facilities like the important <uris> group to include extra files.

author: rich
msg: Fixed to create a WebLogicServerAdapter when running under WebLogic.
